resources.string: The value must be a valid email address.
The value not must be empty.
The value must be at least 2 letters long.
The value must be at least 8 digits long, and contain lowercase, uppercase and number letters. letters
The value must be equal to the entered password.
The signup up token is not valid
This date cannot be in the future.
The value must be a valid url.
The server with this URL can\'t be reached.
